sentences.english: Codification will be appointed in 1912 Compilation.
The memoir of dynasties compiled in Ming Dynasty is considered the important material for the historiographic study.

sentences.english: The first chapter reviews the compiling process and the status of the"the Complete Books of Taxes and Labor Service"in Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分，考述清代的赋役全书的纂修过程及其地位。
